titles.title: Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act of 2023
Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act of 2023
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the number of individuals from the District of Columbia who may be appointed to military service academies.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act of 2023
This bill increases from 5 to 15 the number of individuals from the District of Columbia who may be appointed to the U.S. Military Academy, U.S. Naval Academy, and U.S. Air Force Academy.
